strongs_def: to rot thoroughly, i.e. (by implication) to ruin (passively, decay utterly, figuratively, pervert)
outline:
1. to change for the worse, to corrupt
    1. of minds, morals
  2. to destroy, ruin
    1. to consume
      1. of bodily vigour and strength
      2. of the worm or moth that eats provisions, clothing, etc.
    2. to destroy, to kill
